title: Public transport for the SSAA Shot Expo: Saturday 19th and Sunday 20th October 2024
articleContent:
We're running extra services to get you to and from the 2024 SSAA SHOT Expo at the Melbourne Showgrounds on Saturday 19 and Sunday 20 October.

The event runs: 

  • Saturday 19 October: 9am to 5pm 
  • Sunday 20 October: 9am to 4pm 

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner. Check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the Showgrounds

Catch a Route 472 bus between Footscray Station and Langs Road/Showgrounds. The last service may run before the event ends.

 Regional train

Getting to the Melbourne Showgrounds

Catch a Melbourne Showgrounds train from North Melbourne and Southern Cross stations.

Leaving the Melbourne Showgrounds

Catch any train from Melbourne Showgrounds to Southern Cross or North Melbourne stations and change to a regional train.

Saturday 19 October

 Metropolitan train

Getting to and from Melbourne Showgrounds:

From 8:45am, trains run every 40 minutes from Southern Cross to Melbourne Showgrounds.

Trains leave Southern Cross (Platform 8), stop at North Melbourne (Platform 2), and arrive at Melbourne Showgrounds.

Last train leaves the Showgrounds at 5:15pm.

 Metropolitan tram

Extra Route 57 trams run between Stop 1 Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street and Stop 32 Sandown Road/ Epsom Road via Flemington Road.

 Regional train

Catch a train from North Melbourne or Southern Cross stations to Melbourne Showgrounds.

Sunday 20 October

 Metropolitan train

Getting to and from Melbourne Showgrounds:

From 8:45am, trains run every 40 minutes from Southern Cross to Melbourne Showgrounds.

Trains leave Southern Cross (Platform 8), stop at North Melbourne (Platform 2), and arrive at Melbourne Showgrounds.

Last train leaves the Showgrounds at 4:10pm.

 Metropolitan tram

Extra Route 57 trams run between Stop 1 Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street and Stop 32 Sandown Road/ Epsom Road via Flemington Road.

 Regional train

Catch a train from North Melbourne or Southern Cross stations to Melbourne Showgrounds.
